channel.title: CVE Feed for Cognex -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cognex -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-1522|2024-08-03T00:10:02.959Z -- cognex -- 3d-a1000%20dimensioning%20system
item.description: The Cognex 3D-A1000 Dimensioning System in firmware version 1.0.3 (3354) and prior is vulnerable to CWE-117: Improper Output Neutralization for Logs, which allows an attacker to create false logs that show the password as having been changed when it is not, complicating forensics.

item.title: CVE-2022-1525|2024-08-03T00:10:03.434Z -- cognex -- 3d-a1000%20dimensioning%20system
item.description: The Cognex 3D-A1000 Dimensioning System in firmware version 1.0.3 (3354) and prior is vulnerable to CWE-602: Client-Side Enforcement of Server-Side Security, which could allow attackers to bypass web access controls by inspecting and modifying the source code of password protected web elements.
